articles.author: Ankur Banerjee
articles.title: Asian stocks slip on rate worries, yen in focus - Reuters.com
articles.description: Asian shares slid on Tuesday to their lowest this year as worries over higher U.S interest rates for longer period gripped markets, while the yen wobbled near a one-year low, keeping traders on alert for a possible intervention.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, Oct 3 (Reuters) - Asian shares slid on Tuesday to their lowest this year as worries over higher U.S interest rates for longer period gripped markets, while the yen wobbled near a one-year … [+3630 chars]
